title: Tim Armstrong (Rancid) - A Poet's Life (2007) First 6 Tracks
description:
These are six tracks from Tim Armstrong&#039;s (Rancid) new solo album A Poet&#039;s Life. He made these tracks freely available from different sites on the internet as a thank you for fans, however, they are hard to find and only the newest are still up, so here&#039;s the 6 that have been released so far. I believe the full album will be out by the very end of May.

Hold On
Wake Up
Into Action
Take This City
Inner City Violence
Lady Dementer
